mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.fact_attribute_id, a.calculation_logic, a.indicators_name, a.indicators_des, c.id as fact_id from tb_atomic_indicators a left join tb_fact_attribute b on a.fact_attribute_id = b.id left join tb_fact c on b.fact_id=c.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.id = ${id}

select a.id, a.fact_attribute_id, a.calculation_logic, a.indicators_name, a.indicators_des, b.fact_field_en_name as factFieldName, c.fact_table_en_name as factName from tb_atomic_indicators a LEFT JOIN tb_fact_attribute b on a.fact_attribute_id=b.id LEFT JOIN tb_fact c on b.fact_id=c.id where a.del_flag=1
and c.id= ${query.factId}
